data.name: Mega Man X2 Sound Collection
data.detailed_description:
Get equipped with the stunningly nostalgic Mega Man X2 Sound Collection, featuring all the classic 16-bit tunes from the original Mega Man X2!

The 30-minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Includes three high quality formats: MP3 (V0 bitrate), 16-bit FLAC and AAC. (Download size: 104MB for MP3, 217MB for FLAC and 147MB for AAC)

Soundtrack files can be found under the game's installation directory below:
\\Steam\steamapps\common\Mega Man X Legacy Collection

©CAPCOM CO., LTD.

-Tracklist-



Composed by Yuki Iwai

01 - Capcom Logo - 0:06 - Yasuaki "Bun Bun" Fujita
02 - Opening Theme - 0:53 - Yuki Iwai
03 - Title - 0:19 - Yuki Iwai
04 - Password - 0:34 - Yuki Iwai
05 - Opening Stage - 1:25 - Yuki Iwai
06 - Sub-Boss 1 - 0:36 - Yuki Iwai
07 - Sub-Boss 2 - 0:38 - Yuki Iwai
08 - Cutscene - 0:28 - Yuki Iwai
09 - Stage Select 1 - 0:38 - Yuki Iwai
10 - Stage Start - 0:08 - Yuki Iwai
11 - Wire Sponge Stage - 1:52 - Yuki Iwai
12 - Morph Moth Stage - 1:44 - Yuki Iwai
13 - Flame Stag Stage - 1:32 - Yuki Iwai
14 - Magna Centipede Stage - 1:32 - Yuki Iwai
15 - Overdrive Ostrich Stage - 1:31 - Yuki Iwai
16 - Bubble Crab Stage - 1:46 - Yuki Iwai
17 - Wheel Gator Stage - 1:04 - Yuki Iwai
18 - Crystal Snail Stage - 1:36 - Yuki Iwai
19 - Boss 1 - 0:23 - Yuki Iwai
20 - Boss 2 - 0:58 - Yuki Iwai
21 - Stage Complete - 0:08 - Yuki Iwai
22 - You Got a New Weapon - 0:41 - Yuki Iwai
23 - Laboratory - 0:36 - Yuki Iwai
24 - Stage Select 2 - 1:05 - Yuki Iwai
25 - X-Hunter Stage 1 - 1:06 - Yuki Iwai
26 - X-Hunter Stage 2 - 0:59 - Yuki Iwai
27 - Zero - 0:39 - Yuki Iwai
28 - Sigma 1 - 0:34 - Yuki Iwai
29 - Sigma 2 - 0:45 - Yuki Iwai
30 - Dr. Light Capsule - 0:35 - Yuki Iwai
31 - Ending - 1:53 - Yuki Iwai
32 - Staff Credits - 1:15 - Yuki Iwai

data.short_description: Get equipped with the stunningly nostalgic Mega Man X2 Sound Collection, featuring all the classic 16-bit tunes from the original Mega Man X2!

fullgame.name: Mega Man X Legacy Collection / ロックマンX アニバーサリー コレクション

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 550 3.2GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 or ATI Radeon™ HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 10.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: *Recommended Controller Xbox 360 Controller (Windows®7/8/8.1) Xbox One Wireless Controller (Windows®10) *Internet connection required for game activation.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS®10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 3570 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 10.0c or better)
  • Additional Notes: *Recommended Controller Xbox 360 Controller (Windows®7/8/8.1) Xbox One Wireless Controller (Windows®10) *Internet connection required for game activation.

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Mega Man X2 Sound Collection
